function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate social-distancing controls in hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and contamination","Mitigation":"Implement strict social-distancing measures, use technology to monitor and enforce distancing protocols","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, automated patient flow control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Ineffective design of protective environments and isolation rooms","Impact":"Risk of infection transmission between different areas of the hospital","Mitigation":"Implement advanced air pressure control systems, design and utilize anterooms as buffers","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, negative pressure rooms, anteroom design","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Hospital architects, facility planners"},{"Description":"High cost and visual barriers associated with anterooms","Impact":"Increased operational costs and potential communication obstacles","Mitigation":"Optimize space utilization, consider alternative layout designs, use digital communication technologies","Technologies":"Space optimization software, virtual communication tools","People":"Hospital administrators, facility planners, medical care teams","Owner":"Hospital management, facility planning team"}]}
